title: [Complete]Network Maintenance - 22/04/2015
body:
Summoners,

In the early hours this morning a small network maintenance was completed in our continual effort improve stability and performance for everyone. After the change was completed we continued to monitor the situation and noticed some players being disconnected from their games.

As a result we have enabled Loss Prevented and disabled ranked queues while we investigate the issue.

**Update**

10:00 - Investigation is continuing. Ranked is still disabled.

10:10 - We're aware that matches may not be starting right now, and have disabled the queues while we work on resolving the issue.

10:15 - Game modes are re-enabled. Ranked is still disabled at this time.

10:20 - Ranked queues have been re-enabled and Loss Prevention has been disabled.

-ToxicHawk
